long_description: Fun and sporty, the REI Fleet Skapris (skirt with capris) combine the coverage of a skirt with the sleek performance of your favorite workout capris. Polyester fabric is moisture-wicking and dries fast, so you stay comfortable no matter the temperature. Built-in capris wick moisture away from body to keep you comfortable and feature mesh panels behind knees to boost ventilation. Mesh panel along back yoke increases ventilation. Fabric provides UPF 50+ protection from harmful solar rays. Elastic waistband with drawcord ensures a comfortable fit. Zippered lumbar pocket stashes valuables. Skirt features a 14.5 in. outseam. The REI Fleet skirt with capris feature an active fit that offers a full range of motion.
short_description: Fun and sporty, the REI Fleet Skapris (skirt with capris) combine the coverage of a skirt with the sleek performance of your favorite workout capris.
